Generation II.Gold: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.
Generation II.Silver: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.
Generation II.Crystal: Usually found hanging on to a fat tree trunk. It shoots out bits of its shell when it sees action.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: When something approaches it, it fires off fragments of its steel shell in attack. This is not a conscious action but a conditioned reflex.
